relevant_findings.carotid_pulse: Normal volume and contour, no audible bruits
relevant_findings.auscultation: Normal S1, grade 2 late-peaking systolic ejection murmur best heard at the base with radiation to the carotid base, soft S2, no S3 or S4
relevant_findings.ECG: Sinus tachycardia, normal axis, normal intervals, borderline left ventricular hypertrophy

relevant_findings.echocardiogram: Severe prosthetic valve stenosis, no aortic valve regurgitation, mild concentric left ventricular hypertrophy, hyperdynamic left ventricular systolic function, no evidence of pulmonary hypertension
relevant_findings.blood_work: Normal troponin values, no anemia, normal thyroid function

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significantly elevated gradients observed from initial echocardiogram showing mild prosthetic valve aortic stenosis with peak/mean gradients of 41/27 mmHg.
